description: LegalIntakeAI conducts an intake interview for an equity dispute, extracts case facts, runs a conflict check, creates a case in the management system, and emails a summary to the client.

messages.content: You are LegalIntakeAI, an AI‑powered legal intake assistant. Gather relevant case details from the user, use the provided tools to extract structured facts, perform a conflict‑of‑interest check, create a new case in the firm’s case‑management platform, and optionally email a summary to the client. Always keep the user informed of each step.

Hi, I’m Alex Rivera, the founder of a SaaS startup called CloudPulse. My co‑founder, Jordan Lee, is refusing to honor the equity split we agreed on when we incorporated in Delaware back in May 2022. According to our Shareholders Agreement, I was issued 55 % of the common stock on 2022‑05-12 and Jordan 45 % on the same date. Jordan claims that after a recent funding round (Series A on 2023‑09-01) he is entitled to a larger share because of his role in product development, but the agreement has no provision for re‑allocation. I’m worried this could become a breach of contract and affect future fundraising. I need legal help to enforce the original agreement.

My contact info: alex.rivera@example.com, phone 555‑123‑4567.
Jurisdiction: Delaware Court of Chancery.
Opposing party: Jordan Lee.

Thank you, Alex. I’m going to capture the information you provided, verify that there’s no conflict of interest, and then create a case for you. First, I’ll extract the structured case facts from our conversation.

arguments.transcript:
Hi, I’m Alex Rivera, the founder of a SaaS startup called CloudPulse. My co‑founder, Jordan Lee, is refusing to honor the equity split we agreed on when we incorporated in Delaware back in May 2022. According to our Shareholders Agreement, I was issued 55 % of the common stock on 2022‑05-12 and Jordan 45 % on the same date. Jordan claims that after a recent funding round (Series A on 2023‑09‑01) he is entitled to a larger share because of his role in product development, but the agreement has no provision for re‑allocation. I’m worried this could become a breach of contract and affect future fundraising. I need legal help to enforce the original agreement.

My contact info: alex.rivera@example.com, phone 555‑123‑4567.
Jurisdiction: Delaware Court of Chancery.
Opposing party: Jordan Lee.

Great—there is no conflict. I’ll now create a new case in the firm’s case‑management system using the extracted data.

case_data.fact_summary: Founder Alex Rivera alleges co‑founder Jordan Lee is refusing to honor a 55/45% equity split set out in a Shareholders Agreement dated 2022‑05‑12. After a Series A round on 2023‑09‑01, Jordan claims a larger share, but the agreement has no re‑allocation clause. Alex seeks enforcement of the original agreement.

messages.content: Your case has been created. I’ll now send you a summary email with the case ID and next‑step instructions.

arguments.subject: Your Legal Intake Summary – Case CM-2025-01873
arguments.body:
Hello Alex,

Thank you for completing the intake interview with LegalIntakeAI. Here is a summary of the information we captured:

- **Case ID:** CM-2025-01873
- **Case Type:** Equity dispute
- **Incident Date:** September 1, 2023
- **Jurisdiction:** Delaware Court of Chancery
- **Opposing Party:** Jordan Lee
- **Fact Summary:** Founder Alex Rivera alleges co‑founder Jordan Lee is refusing to honor a 55/45% equity split set out in a Shareholders Agreement dated May 12, 2022. After a Series A round on September 1, 2023, Jordan claims a larger share, but the agreement has no re‑allocation clause. Alex seeks enforcement of the original agreement.

Your intake has been entered into our case‑management system. A member of the firm will review the details and contact you within 1‑2 business days to discuss next steps.

If you have any additional documents (e.g., the Shareholders Agreement), please reply to this email with the attachments.

Best regards,
LegalIntakeAI Team

messages.content: All set, Alex! I’ve sent the summary email to **alex.rivera@example.com** with your new case ID **CM-2025-01873**. A lawyer will be in touch shortly. If you have any other questions or need to upload additional documents, just let me know.
